Title: Increases the number of licenses for tow truck operators in a city with a population of one million or more
Summary: Requires the commissioner of transportation to increase the number of licenses for tow truck operators in a city with a population of one million or more by thirty percent by December 31, 2025.
LawCode: Amd ยง20-520, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing the number of licenses for tow truck operators
